text: Leposternon maximus is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 2011 Category:Taxa named by Síria Ribeiro Category:Taxa named by Cristiano Nogueira Category:Taxa named by Carlos Eduardo D. Cintra Category:Taxa named by Nelson Jorge Da Silva Jr. Category:Taxa named by Hussam Zaher Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Leposternon maximus
